channel.title: ░▒▓█ HARDCORE FACTIONS █▓▒░ ♔ COME PLAY ♔ 24/7, ♔ McMMO ♔, ♔ ShowCase Shops ♔
channel.description:
[center][url=http://www.planetminecraft.com/server/crafty-builders/][img]http://i.imgur.com/9QtMn.png[/img][/url]
[size=14pt]The server is running on a 3GB Sever From [url=http://"http://www.mcprohosting.com"]Mc Pro Hosting[/url]
Brand New Alot Of Land come join us and build your house anywhere And fight against others in battle for survival.
Server Ip: 184.164.140.202
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FbDIwhfYfQ8
Forums Page: [url=http://www.cbpvp.tk]www.cbpvp.tk[/url]
Some Pictures of The Sever
[img]http://i.imgur.com/RwYts.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/RRZXC.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Fu4Rq.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ded07.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/tXEUZ.png[/img]
[url=http://minecraftviewer.com/servers/381982/view][img]http://cache.multiplayuk.com/b/1-381982-560x95-4-FF5519-FFFFFF.png[/img][/url]
Security:9 Featuring plugins like Nocheat, Factions, and WorldGuard, the server should be secure. But unfortunately, Griefing happens from time to time. On servers that have strict anti-grief, creations on this server wouldn't really be able to happen. It's hard to find the right balance, but they seem to have a good balance. Worth it.
Community: 10 The Community is amazing. Players and Admins make art on this server. The Factions is the reason enough to give it a ten. PLayers are often times active and participating in Events.
Staff: 9 I feel terrible for giving this place only a 9. But they have three Server Operators, which is an outstanding number in terms of power. But other staff are often times on, and even operators are participating in events.
Fun Factor: 9 you find alot to do on this server when you first join. There are things to check out, creations to build, and communities to contribute to. I had a lot of fun being on this server, and I will continue going on.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/3BNts.png[/img]
★McMMO ★Factions ★PvP Awards ★Shops ★Groups ★iConomy
[img]http://i.imgur.com/sel5z.png[/img]
★None Really
★Support us★[/size] [/center]

item.description:
@Crafty_Builders wrote:

[center]

[size=14pt]The server is running on a 3GB Sever From Mc Pro Hosting

Brand New Alot Of Land come join us and build your house anywhere
And fight against others in battle for survival.

Server Ip: 184.164.140.202

Forums Page: www.cbpvp.tk

Some Pictures of The Sever

RwYts.png1600×850

RRZXC.jpg1600×848

Fu4Rq.jpg1600×848

ded07.png1600×848

Security:9
Featuring plugins like Nocheat, Factions, and WorldGuard, the server should be secure. But unfortunately, Griefing happens from time to time. On servers that have strict anti-grief, creations on this server wouldn’t really be able to happen. It’s hard to find the right balance, but they seem to have a good balance. Worth it.

Community: 10
The Community is amazing. Players and Admins make art on this server. The Factions is the reason enough to give it a ten. PLayers are often times active and participating in Events.

Staff: 9
I feel terrible for giving this place only a 9. But they have three Server Operators, which is an outstanding number in terms of power. But other staff are often times on, and even operators are participating in events.

Fun Factor: 9
you find alot to do on this server when you first join. There are things to check out, creations to build, and communities to contribute to. I had a lot of fun being on this server, and I will continue going on.

★McMMO
★Factions
★PvP Awards
★Shops
★Groups
★iConomy

★None Really

★Support us★[/size]
[/center]
